title: Guide
text:
Session Summary
This data measures progress toward the objective Increased Guided Reading and Writing. The session summary tracks your activities throughout the year.
When to enter: Update regularly throughout the program year to maintain accurate records.
Best practice: Enter session data after each meeting or weekly

title: Guide
text:
Girl Survey
This data measures the Life Skills Objectives.
Pre and post surveys are essential for measuring participant outcomes in the Get REAL! program.
When to enter: - Pre-survey: At program start or when a girl joins - Post-survey: At program conclusion or when a girl completes the program
Note: Surveys can be entered at any time, but both pre and post surveys are required for each participant.

title: Guide
text:
Attendance
This data measures the Decreased Absenteeism objective.
When to enter: - Minimum requirement: Enter attendance at two data points (e.g., Quarter 1 and Quarter 4, or baseline and endpoint of program participant)
Best practice: Enter attendance data regularly

title: Guide
text:
Grade Promotion
Grade promotion status confirms academic progress for program participants.
When to enter: At the end of the school year once promotion status is confirmed, or as soon as you receive this information.


Data Entry Reports
Nearly every Saturday, data is pulled from Qualtrics and data entry reports are generated for each data source. An email will be sent with a link to your report. During the data pull, data quality is assessed and duplicate entries are identified and reported.


Questions
If you have questions, concerns, or want to review your data, email me at kevingilds@gmail.com and I will send you a CSV file with the requested information.

title: FAQ
text:
We need to add a site
Email üì´:kevingilds@gmail.com and confirm what Girl Scout Council you are from.

I strive to add sites within a business day.

If the site is still not showing up in the survey form Qualtrics: Email me again, and I will determine if I can reproduce the error.

If it is still an issue you may need to work with your IT to clear your web cache.



Data Entry
Data is pulled from Qualtrics every weekend usually Saturday.

title: About Get REAL!
text:
Girl Scout councils facilitate Get REAL!, a statewide mentoring program for middle school girls. The Get REAL! program aims to help at-risk middle school girls achieve academic success by connecting them to caring mentors in the community. Get REAL! is delivered through 30 small group mentoring sessions. The mentoring sessions provide support, intervention, and connection to other resources to help girls achieve success.
The participating councils include the following organizations:

Girl Scouts of Citrus
Girl Scout of Gateway Council
Girl Scouts of Southeast Florida
Girl Scouts of West Central Florida

The Girl Scout councils have partner with around 30 schools and after-school sites to deliver the program. Enrollment targets vary by quarter, with steady increases and a peak in Quarter 3 to serve 900 girls.
